title: *4co2* diagnostics erroneous for CNRM-ESM2-1 simulations
description: CNRM-ESM2-1 so-called *4co2* diagnostics, instantaneous radiation fields under 4*CO2 conditions, have been incorrectly produced as identical diagnostics as the corresponding fields under CO2 conditions. These diagnostics consist in 12 variables named rld4co2*, rldcs4co2*, rlu4co2*, rlucs4co2*, rlut4co2*, rlutcs4co2*,  rsd4co2*, rsdcs4co2*, rsu4co2*, rsucs4co2*, rsut4co2*, rsutcs4co2*. These datasets have been unpublished on ESGF.
